CustomField.description: Consolidated Contact Status used for Stamping on Tasks, Events and NVM Call Summaries for reporting purposes
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(First_Quote_Date__c),"Non-Quoter", IF((TODAY() - Date_of_Last_Quote__c) < 31,"Recent Quoter", IF((TODAY() - Date_of_Last_Quote__c) < 91,"Latent Quoter", "Lapsed Quoter") ) )
CustomField.label: Activity Contact Status
